PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : real or complex vector or matrix

DESCRIPTION.P: This function computes the mean absolute deviation of a real or complex vector or matrix x.
For a vector or matrix x, s2=mad(x) returns in scalar s2 the mean absolute deviation of all the entries of x.

BIBLIO.P: Reference: Wonacott T.H.& Wonacott R.J. .- Introductory Statistics, 5th edition, John Wiley, 1990.
